items.title: Nuclear Power Corp taps Engineers India help develop Bharat Small Modular Reactor
items.description: The partnership will support Centre's vision to accelerate the share of nuclear power and strengthen India’s energy security, and will be targetting a nuclear power capacity of 100 GW by 2047.

items.title: MC Insider | Trouble on the tracks, a rule to regulate star power and new bank in town
items.description: Read untold stories from the world of business and corridors of power

items.title: Cello World: Q1 FY26 misses estimates; margin guidance lower
items.description: Higher discounting and marketing costs, as well as the inability to raise prices in the wake of increased competition, affected margins in Q1FY26.

items.title: Apollo Hospital: Growth momentum continues in Q1 FY26
items.description: Robust expansion plans in place, with a target of about 4,000 beds in the next 3-4 years

items.title: Rural push, SUV surge keep Hyundai on track
items.description: Lower volumes due to weak domestic sentiment weighs on performance
